price: Ya ce: "Dã dai inã da wani ƙarfi game da ku, kõ kuwa inã da gõyon bãya daga wani rukuni* mai ƙarfi?"
arabic: قَالَ لَوۡ أَنَّ لِي بِكُمۡ قُوَّةً أَوۡ ءَاوِيٓ إِلَىٰ رُكۡنٖ شَدِيدٖ
footnotes: * Ya faɗi haka dõmin bã shi da dangi a cikin su. Daga gare shi ba a kuma aiko wani Annabi ba sai a cikin wadãtar dangin sa.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qāla law anna lī bikum quwwatan aw āwī ilā ruk'nin shadīdin
